title: Newly Re-Elected, FIFA's Sepp Blatter Denies Ties To Corruption
teaser: At a press conference Saturday, newly re-elected FIFA president Sepp Blatter was defiant, insisting he had nothing to fear from the ongoing investigation. NPR's Scott Simon talks with AP's Rob Harris.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
